author: Scott Polacek
title: Joe Burrow, Dwight Howard Among Stars Playing in Facebook Gaming for Charity
description: Sports are largely on hiatus during the coronavirus pandemic, but fans won't have to wait until they return to watch Joe Burrow, Christian McCaffrey, Jarvis Landry,  Dwight Howard  and others put their skills to the test in a tournament setting...
content:
David J. Phillip/Associated Press
